title: ATTi vaippAn
sahitya:
ATTi vaippAn yArO ariyEnE inda Aruyir vAzhkkaiyai angum ingum alaindE


anupallavi

  pUTTi vaitta pulanaik-kUTTi vaitta manadai puram sellap-puram sellap-puram sellum kurangu pOl


caraNam    kaNNukku kaNNAgi kAdukku kAdAgi karuttuk-karuttAgi kAdalukk-inbAgi
maNNukkuLLE vErAgi marattil pUtta malarAgi viNNukkuLLE oLiyAgi 
vITTukkuLLE uyirAgi viruppu veruppu mEDaiyilE veTri tOlvit-tirai pOTTE
